title: [Minecraft.net|Merch]好看的生物帽子正在出售中
author: 凛
txt_content:
本帖最后由 china521 于 2017-8-7 10:01 编辑 

 MERCH好看的生物帽子正在出售中!
Magnificent mob hats now on sale!外面开始变得冷了.风在外面呼啸!大雨鞭挞着大地!毫无疑问,雪也要跟着来了.我们已经体会到了在瑞典的冬天里能做什么了 - 就像你在Shoghi的推文中看到的那样!
It’s getting pretty chilly outside. The wind howls! The rain lashes! No doubt, the snows are soon to follow. We've already had a taste of what winter can do here in Sweden - as you might have noticed from Shoghi's twitter feed!幸运的的是,我们已经在我们的商店中上架了新的帽子来使您的头部免受寒风的威胁.每个帽子都是以生物为原型设计的,有的凶猛,有的友好.一些帽子后面还配有可以调节的带子来适应每个人头部的尺寸!
Luckily, we’ve updated our merch store with new bits of headwear to keep your precious pate protected from the elements. Each of the designs is themed around a mob, some ferocious, some friendly. Many come with adjustable straps at the back to ensure that these fine items fit heads of many sizes!看看下面,有什么是你想要的!别忘了:我们的商店里面还有更多酷炫的东西.快去看看吧.
Have a look below and see if there's anything you fancy! And don't forget: there’s even more cool stuff on our merch store. Go check it out!
啊,经典的MC怪物!带上这个酷爆了的creeper帽子变成一个残酷的,绿油油的时尚机械吧!你可以在J!NX上买到它
Ah, the classic Minecraft mob! Become a mean, green fashion machine with this cool creeper cap! Get it from J!NX right here
戴上这个值得信赖的帽子来使您的头部免受寒风的摧残.你可以在J!NX上买到它
Don this trusty headwear to protect your precious brainpan from assault by the cruel elements. Get it from J!NX right here

戴上这个末影人风格的帽子来避开那些无礼的视线!你可以在J!NX上买到它
Tug this Enderman-themed cap down and avoid the impudent gaze of those who displease you! Get it from J!NX right here
原文地址:https://minecraft.net/en-us/article/magnificent-mob-hats-now-sale原作者:Marsh Davies发布日期:11/24/2016译者:china521翻译日期:8/7/2017P.S.远古文章没人翻译,我来打个酱油
[groupid=128]HAYO Studio[/groupid]
